name: Clocks
tagline: A fully featured and rendered 3D Clock using WebGL.
body:
Features Include:

* Starting & Stopping the hands 
* Setting your own time 
* Automatically retreiving the correct time from the Internet
* Increasing/Decreasing hand speeds 
* Zoom In/Out
* Alarm
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
